com.andoverrobotics.core.utilities

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.utilities.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility functions that convert between radians and degrees, millimeters and inches, and normalize angle measures.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double TAU
      The τ constant, or two times π.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Converter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double degreesToRadians(double degrees)
      Converts the given angle measure in degrees into the equivalent measure in radians.
      static double inchesToMillimeters(double inches)
      Converts the given distance (in inches) to millimeters.
      static double millimetersToInches(double millimeters)
      Converts the given distance (in millimeters) to inches.
      static double normalizedDegrees(double inputDegrees)
      Converts the given angle measure in degrees to its equivalent value in the [0, 360] range.
      static double normalizedRadians(double inputRadians)
      Converts the given angle measure in radians to its equivalent value in the [0, TAU] range.
      static double radiansToDegrees(double radians)
      Converts the given angle measure in radians into the equivalent measure in degrees.

      • normalizedDegrees

        public static double normalizedDegrees(double inputDegrees)
        Converts the given angle measure in degrees to its equivalent value in the [0, 360] range.
        Parameters:
        inputDegrees - The angle measure of which the equivalent value in the [0, 360] range will be returned
        Returns:
        The equivalent value of the given angle measure in the [0, 360] range
